This package allows the user to efficiently build an FM index from an input FASTA file. The FM index data structure can be also saved in a user-defined output folder. The obtained FM index can then be used to look for patterns inside a sequence, using an implementation of Backward search

```{r setup}
library(FMIndexR)
```

```{r}
sessionInfo()
```
